Package gr.forth.ics.graph

Interface Summary
Edge An edge that connects two nodes.
Graph A modifiable graph.
Graph.OrderManager Provides methods for reordering (in terms of iteration) the elements of a graph.
InspectableGraph A read-only graph.
Node A Node is the basic element of a Graph.
Tuple Entity that can be decorated with custom entries.
 

Class Summary
Filters  
FlexiGraph  
FoldingGraph  
GraphChecker Various graph property checking static methods.
GraphCloner This class provides a simple utility to create copies of graphs.
GraphCloner.GraphMapper  
GraphFactory Deprecated.
GraphForwarder  
Graphs  
InspectableGraphForwarder  
PrimaryGraph Fastest Graph implementation, which has the restriction that its nodes and edges cannot be contained in any other PrimaryGraph (but they can be contained in as many SecondaryGraphs as desirable).
SecondaryGraph Flexible Graph implementation, which can contain (adopt) nodes and edges from any other graph.
 

Enum Summary
Direction The direction that an eligible Edge sbetween two Nodes should have.
Edge.Orientation The kinds of relationship that two edges may have.
Hint Runtime performance hints that can be used by graph implementations.
 

Exception Summary
GraphException
